verses.verse: מַשְׂכִּ֗יל <WH4905> mas-Kil, Maschil לְאָ֫סָ֥ף <WH623> le-'A-Saf of Asaph הַאֲזִ֣ינָה <WH238> ha-'a-Zi-nah Give ear עַ֭מִּי <WH5971> 'Am-mi O my people תּוֹרָתִ֑י <WH8451> to-ra-Ti; [to] my law הַטּ֥וּ <WH5186> hat-Tu incline אָ֝זְנְכֶ֗ם <WH241> 'a-ze-ne-Chem, your ears לְאִמְרֵי־ <WH561> le-'im-rei- to the words פִֽי׃ <WH6310> Fi. of my mouth

אֶפְתְּחָ֣ה <WH6605> 'ef-te-Chah I will open בְמָשָׁ֣ל <WH4912> ve-ma-Shal in a parable פִּ֑י <WH6310> Pi; my mouth אַבִּ֥יעָה <WH5042> 'ab-Bi-'ah I will utter חִ֝יד֗וֹת <WH2420> chi-Dot, dark sayings מִנִּי־ <WH4480> min-ni- at קֶֽדֶם׃ <WH6924> Ke-dem. of old

אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher Which שָׁ֭מַעְנוּ <WH8085> ma'-nu Which we have heard וַנֵּדָעֵ֑ם <WH3045> van-ne-da-'Em; and known וַ֝אֲבוֹתֵ֗ינוּ <WH1> va-'a-vo-Tei-nu, and our fathers סִפְּרוּ־ <WH5608> sip-pe-ru- have told לָֽנוּ׃ La-nu.

לֹ֤א <WH3808> lo We will not נְכַחֵ֨ד׀ <WH3582> ne-cha-Ched We will not hide מִבְּנֵיהֶ֗ם <WH1121> mib-be-nei-Hem, [them] from their children לְד֥וֹר <WH1755> le-Dor to the generation אַחֲר֗וֹן <WH314> a-cha-Ron, to come מְֽ֭סַפְּרִים <WH5608> Me-sap-pe-rim shewing תְּהִלּ֣וֹת <WH8416> te-hil-Lot the praises יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; of the LORD וֶעֱזוּז֥וֹ <WH5807> ve-'e-zu-Zo and his strength וְ֝נִפְלְאוֹתָ֗יו <WH6381> ve-nif-le-'o-Tav, and his wonderful works אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher he עָשָֽׂה׃ <WH6213> 'a-Sah. that he hath done

וַיָּ֤קֶם <WH6965> vai-Ya-kem For he established עֵד֨וּת׀ <WH5715> 'e-Dut a testimony בְּֽיַעֲקֹ֗ב <WH3290> be-ya-'a-Ko, in Jacob וְתוֹרָה֮ <WH8451> ve-to-Rah a law שָׂ֤ם <WH7760> sam and appointed בְּיִשְׂרָ֫אֵ֥ל <WH3478> be-yis-Ra-'El in Israel אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher Which צִ֭וָּה <WH6680> Tziv-vah which he commanded אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אֲבוֹתֵ֑ינוּ <WH1> a-vo-Tei-nu; our fathers לְ֝הוֹדִיעָ֗ם <WH3045> le-ho-di-'Am, that they should make them known לִבְנֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH1121> liv-nei-Hem. to their children

לְמַ֤עַן <WH4616> le-Ma-'an might יֵדְע֨וּ׀ <WH3045> ye-de-'U might know דּ֣וֹר <WH1755> Dor That the generation אַ֭חֲרוֹן <WH314> 'A-cha-ron to come בָּנִ֣ים <WH1121> ba-Nim [them even] the children יִוָּלֵ֑דוּ <WH3205> yiv-va-Le-du; [which] should be born יָ֝קֻ֗מוּ <WH6965> ya-Ku-mu, [who] should arise וִֽיסַפְּר֥וּ <WH5608> vi-sap-pe-Ru and declare לִבְנֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH1121> liv-nei-Hem. [them] to their children

וְיָשִׂ֥ימוּ <WH7760> ve-ya-Si-mu That they might set בֵֽאלֹהִ֗ים <WH430> ve-lo-Him, in God כִּ֫סְלָ֥ם <WH3689> kis-Lam their hope וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> ve-Lo and not יִ֭שְׁכְּחוּ <WH7911> Yish-ke-chu and not forget מַֽעַלְלֵי־ <WH4611> ma-'al-lei- the works אֵ֑ל <WH410> 'El; of God וּמִצְוֹתָ֥יו <WH4687> u-mitz-vo-Tav his commandments יִנְצֹֽרוּ׃ <WH5341> yin-Tzo-ru. but keep

וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> ve-Lo not יִהְי֨וּ׀ <WH1961> yih-Yu become כַּאֲבוֹתָ֗ם <WH1> ka-'a-vo-Tam, And might not be as their fathers דּוֹר֮ <WH1755> dOr generation סוֹרֵ֪ר <WH5637> so-Rer a stubborn וּמֹ֫רֶ֥ה <WH4784> u-Mo-Reh and rebellious דּ֭וֹר <WH1755> Dor a generation לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- did not הֵכִ֣ין <WH3559> he-Chin aright לִבּ֑וֹ <WH3820> lib-Bo; not their heart וְלֹא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- was not נֶאֶמְנָ֖ה <WH539> ne-'em-Nah was not stedfast אֶת־ <WH854> 'et- for אֵ֣ל <WH410> 'el with God רוּחֽוֹ׃ <WH7307> ru-Cho. and whose spirit

בְּֽנֵי־ <WH1121> be-nei- The children אֶפְרַ֗יִם <WH669> 'ef-Ra-yim, of Ephraim נוֹשְׁקֵ֥י <WH5401> no-she-Kei [being] armed רוֹמֵי־ <WH7411> ro-mei- [and] carrying קָ֑שֶׁת <WH7198> Ka-shet; bows הָ֝פְכ֗וּ <WH2015> ha-fe-Chu, turned back בְּי֣וֹם <WH3117> be-Yom in the day קְרָֽב׃ <WH7128> ke-Rav. of battle

לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo did not שָׁ֭מְרוּ <WH8104> me-ru They kept בְּרִ֣ית <WH1285> be-Rit not the covenant אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> E-lo-Him; of God וּ֝בְתוֹרָת֗וֹ <WH8451> u-ve-to-ra-To, in his law מֵאֲנ֥וּ <WH3985> me-'a-Nu and refused לָלֶֽכֶת׃ <WH1980> la-Le-chet. to walk

וַיִּשְׁכְּח֥וּ <WH7911> vai-yish-ke-Chu And forgat עֲלִילוֹתָ֑יו <WH5949> a-li-lo-Tav; his works וְ֝נִפְלְאוֹתָ֗יו <WH6381> ve-nif-le-'o-Tav, and his wonders אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher he הֶרְאָֽם׃ <WH7200> her-'Am. that he had shewed

נֶ֣גֶד <WH5048> Ne-ged he in the sight אֲ֭בוֹתָם <WH1> A-vo-tom of their fathers עָ֣שָׂה <WH6213> 'A-sah did פֶ֑לֶא <WH6382> Fe-le; Marvellous things בְּאֶ֖רֶץ <WH776> be-'E-retz in the land מִצְרַ֣יִם <WH4714> mitz-Ra-yim of Egypt שְׂדֵה־ <WH7704> se-deh- [in] the field צֹֽעַן׃ <WH6814> Tzo-'an. of Zoan

בָּ֣קַע <WH1234> Ba-ka' He divided יָ֭ם <WH3220> yam the sea וַיַּֽעֲבִירֵ֑ם <WH5674> vai-ya-'a-vi-Rem; and caused them to pass through וַֽיַּצֶּב־ <WH5324> vai-yatz-tzev- to stand מַ֥יִם <WH4325> Ma-yim and he made the waters כְּמוֹ־ <WH3644> ke-mov- like נֵֽד׃ <WH5067> Ned. as an heap

וַיַּנְחֵ֣ם <WH5148> vai-yan-Chem also he led בֶּעָנָ֣ן <WH6051> be-'a-Nan them with a cloud יוֹמָ֑ם <WH3119> yo-Mam; In the daytime וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol and all הַ֝לַּ֗יְלָה <WH3915> hal-Lay-lah, and all the night בְּא֣וֹר <WH216> be-'or with a light אֵֽשׁ׃ <WH784> 'Esh. of fire

יְבַקַּ֣ע <WH1234> ye-vak-Ka' He clave צֻ֭רִים <WH6697> Tzu-rim the rocks בַּמִּדְבָּ֑ר <WH4057> bam-mid-Bar; in the wilderness וַ֝יַּ֗שְׁקְ <WH8248> vai-Yashk, and gave [them] drink כִּתְהֹמ֥וֹת <WH8415> kit-ho-Mot depths רַבָּֽה׃ <WH7227> rab-Bah. as [out of] the great

וַיּוֹצִ֣א <WH3318> vai-yo-Tzi He brought נוֹזְלִ֣ים <WH5140> noz-Lim streams מִסָּ֑לַע <WH5553> mis-Sa-la'; also out of the rock וַיּ֖וֹרֶד <WH3381> vai-Yo-red to run down כַּנְּהָר֣וֹת <WH5104> kan-ne-ha-Rot like rivers מָֽיִם׃ <WH4325> Ma-yim. and caused waters

וַיּוֹסִ֣יפוּ <WH3254> vai-yo-Si-fu yet more ע֭וֹד <WH5750> od still לַחֲטֹא־ <WH2398> la-cha-to- And they sinned ל֑וֹ lo; לַֽמְר֥וֹת <WH4784> lam-Rot against him by provoking עֶ֝לְי֗וֹן <WH5945> el-Yon, the most High בַּצִּיָּֽה׃ <WH6723> batz-tzi-Yah. in the wilderness

וַיְנַסּוּ־ <WH5254> vay-nas-su- And they tempted אֵ֥ל <WH410> 'el God בִּלְבָבָ֑ם <WH3824> bil-va-Vam; in their heart לִֽשְׁאָל־ <WH7592> lish-'ol- by asking אֹ֥כֶל <WH400> 'O-chel meat לְנַפְשָֽׁם׃ <WH5315> le-naf-Sham. for their lust

וַֽיְדַבְּר֗וּ <WH1696> vay-dab-be-Ru, Yea they spake בֵּֽאלֹ֫הִ֥ים <WH430> be-Lo-Him against God אָ֭מְרוּ <WH559> 'A-me-ru they said הֲי֣וּכַל <WH3201> ha-Yu-chal Can אֵ֑ל <WH410> 'El; God לַעֲרֹ֥ךְ <WH6186> la-'a-Roch furnish שֻׁ֝לְחָ֗ן <WH7979> le-Chan, a table בַּמִּדְבָּֽר׃ <WH4057> bam-mid-Bar. desert

הֵ֤ן <WH2005> hen Behold הִכָּה־ <WH5221> hik-kah- Behold he smote צ֨וּר׀ <WH6697> tzur the rock וַיָּז֣וּבוּ <WH2100> vai-ya-Zu-vu gushed out מַיִם֮ <WH4325> ma-Yim that the waters וּנְחָלִ֪ים <WH5158> u-ne-cha-Lim and the streams יִ֫שְׁטֹ֥פוּ <WH7857> yish-To-fu overflowed הֲגַם־ <WH1571> ha-gam- again לֶ֭חֶם <WH3899> Le-chem bread י֣וּכַל <WH3201> Yu-chal can תֵּ֑ת <WH5414> Tet; he give אִם־ <WH518> 'im- lo יָכִ֖ין <WH3559> ya-Chin he provide שְׁאֵ֣ר <WH7607> she-'Er flesh לְעַמּֽוֹ׃ <WH5971> le-'am-Mo. folk

לָכֵ֤ן׀ <WH3651> la-Chen Therefore שָׁמַ֥ע <WH8085> sha-Ma' heard יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh Therefore the LORD וַֽיִּתְעַבָּ֥ר <WH5674> vai-yit-'ab-Bar [this] and was wroth וְ֭אֵשׁ <WH784> Ve-'esh so a fire נִשְּׂקָ֣ה <WH5400> nis-se-Kah was kindled בְיַעֲקֹ֑ב <WH3290> ve-ya-'a-Ko; against Jacob וְגַם־ <WH1571> ve-gam- also אַ֝֗ף <WH639> 'Af, and anger עָלָ֥ה <WH5927> 'a-Lah also came up בְיִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> ve-Yis-ra-'El. against Israel

כִּ֤י <WH3588> ki Because לֹ֣א <WH3808> lo did not הֶ֭אֱמִינוּ <WH539> He-'e-mi-nu Because they believed בֵּאלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> be-lo-Him; not in God וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> ve-Lo and did not בָ֝טְח֗וּ <WH982> va-te-Chu, and trusted בִּֽישׁוּעָתֽוֹ׃ <WH3444> bi-shu-'a-to. not in his salvation

וַיְצַ֣ו <WH6680> vay-Tzav Though he had commanded שְׁחָקִ֣ים <WH7834> she-cha-Kim the clouds מִמָּ֑עַל <WH4605> mi-Ma-'al; from above וְדַלְתֵ֖י <WH1817> ve-dal-Tei the doors שָׁמַ֣יִם <WH8064> sha-Ma-yim of heaven פָּתָֽח׃ <WH6605> pa-Tach. and opened

וַיַּמְטֵ֬ר <WH4305> vai-yam-Ter And had rained down עֲלֵיהֶ֣ם <WH5921> 'a-lei-Hem and מָ֣ן <WH4478> man manna לֶאֱכֹ֑ל <WH398> le-'e-Chol; upon them to eat וּדְגַן־ <WH1715> u-de-ga-no-Sha- them of the corn שָׁ֝מַ֗יִם <WH8064> Ma-yim, of heaven נָ֣תַן <WH5414> Na-tan and had given לָֽמוֹ׃ la-mo.

לֶ֣חֶם <WH3899> Le-chem food אַ֭בִּירִים <WH47> 'Ab-bi-rim angels' אָ֣כַל <WH398> 'A-chal did eat אִ֑ישׁ <WH376> 'Ish; Man צֵידָ֬ה <WH6720> tzei-Dah them meat שָׁלַ֖ח <WH7971> sha-Lach he sent לָהֶ֣ם <WH1992> la-Hem in לָשֹֽׂבַע׃ <WH7648> la-Soa'. to the full

יַסַּ֣ע <WH5265> yas-Sa' to blow קָ֭דִים <WH6921> Ka-dim He caused an east wind בַּשָּׁמָ֑יִם <WH8064> bash-sha-Ma-yim; in the heaven וַיְנַהֵ֖ג <WH5090> vay-na-Heg he brought in בְּעֻזּ֣וֹ <WH5797> be-'uz-Zo and by his power תֵימָֽן׃ <WH8486> tei-Man. the south wind

וַיַּמְטֵ֬ר <WH4305> vai-yam-Ter He rained עֲלֵיהֶ֣ם <WH5921> 'a-lei-Hem upon כֶּעָפָ֣ר <WH6083> ke-'a-Far also upon them as dust שְׁאֵ֑ר <WH7607> she-'Er; flesh וּֽכְח֥וֹל <WH2344> u-che-Chol like as the sand יַ֝מִּ֗ים <WH3220> yam-Mim, of the sea ע֣וֹף <WH5775> of fowls כָּנָֽף׃ <WH3671> ka-Naf. and feathered

וַ֭יַּפֵּל <WH5307> Vai-yap-pel And he let [it] fall בְּקֶ֣רֶב <WH7130> be-Ke-rev in the midst מַחֲנֵ֑הוּ <WH4264> ma-cha-Ne-hu; of their camp סָ֝בִ֗יב <WH5439> sa-Viv, round about לְמִשְׁכְּנֹתָֽיו׃ <WH4908> le-mish-ke-no-Tav. their habitations

וַיֹּאכְל֣וּ <WH398> vai-yo-che-Lu So they did eat וַיִּשְׂבְּע֣וּ <WH7646> vai-yis-be-'U filled מְאֹ֑ד <WH3966> me-'Od; and were well וְ֝תַֽאֲוָתָ֗ם <WH8378> ve-ta-'a-va-Tam, them their own desire יָבִ֥א <WH935> ya-Vi for he gave לָהֶֽם׃ <WH1992> la-Hem. like

לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- not זָר֥וּ <WH2114> za-Ru They were not estranged מִתַּאֲוָתָ֑ם <WH8378> mit-ta-'a-va-Tam; from their lust ע֝֗וֹד <WH5750> od, While אָכְלָ֥ם <WH400> 'a-che-Lam But while their meat בְּפִיהֶֽם׃ <WH6310> be-fi-Hem. [was] yet in their mouths

וְאַ֤ף <WH639> ve-'Af The wrath אֱלֹהִ֨ים׀ <WH430> E-lo-Him of God עָ֘לָ֤ה <WH5927> 'a-Lah came בָהֶ֗ם va-Hem, וַֽ֭יַּהֲרֹג <WH2026> Vai-ya-ha-rog upon them and slew בְּמִשְׁמַנֵּיהֶ֑ם <WH4924> be-mish-man-nei-Hem; the fattest וּבַחוּרֵ֖י <WH970> u-va-chu-Rei the chosen יִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El [men] of Israel הִכְרִֽיעַ׃ <WH3766> hich-Ri-a'. of them and smote down

בְּכָל־ <WH3605> be-chol of all זֹ֭את <WH2063> zot likewise חָֽטְאוּ־ <WH2398> cha-te-'u- For all this they sinned ע֑וֹד <WH5750> od; still וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- and did not הֶ֝אֱמִ֗ינוּ <WH539> he-'e-Mi-nu, still and believed בְּנִפְלְאוֹתָֽיו׃ <WH6381> be-nif-le-'o-Tav. not for his wondrous works

וַיְכַל־ <WH3615> vay-chal- did he consume בַּהֶ֥בֶל <WH1892> ba-He-vel in vanity יְמֵיהֶ֑ם <WH3117> ye-mei-Hem; Therefore their days וּ֝שְׁנוֹתָ֗ם <WH8141> u-she-no-Tam, and their years בַּבֶּהָלָֽה׃ <WH928> bab-be-ha-Lah. in trouble

אִם־ <WH518> 'im- When הֲרָגָ֥ם <WH2026> ha-ra-Gam When he slew וּדְרָשׁ֑וּהוּ <WH1875> u-de-ra-Shu-hu; them then they sought וְ֝שָׁ֗בוּ <WH7725> ve-Sha-vu, him and they returned וְשִֽׁחֲרוּ־ <WH7836> ve-shi-cha-ru- and enquired early אֵֽל׃ <WH410> 'El. after God

וַֽ֭יִּזְכְּרוּ <WH2142> Vai-yiz-ke-ru And they remembered כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- that אֱלֹהִ֣ים <WH430> E-lo-Him that God צוּרָ֑ם <WH6697> tzu-Ram; [was] their rock וְאֵ֥ל <WH410> ve-'El God עֶ֝לְיוֹן <WH5945> 'El-yon and the high גֹּאֲלָֽם׃ <WH1350> go-'a-Lam. their redeemer

וַיְפַתּ֥וּהוּ <WH6601> vay-fat-Tu-hu Nevertheless they did flatter בְּפִיהֶ֑ם <WH6310> be-fi-Hem; him with their mouth וּ֝בִלְשׁוֹנָ֗ם <WH3956> u-vil-sho-Nam, unto him with their tongues יְכַזְּבוּ־ <WH3576> ye-chaz-ze-vu- and they lied לֽוֹ׃ lo.
